item.title: I am having the invalid number of parameters problem
item.dc:creator: @scarnoob scarnoob
item.description:
@scarnoob wrote:

line 22 invalid number of parameters
here’s the script.

program Powerminerattempt1;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if(invfull = true) then
end;

procedure dropal;
begin
dropto (2-28)
end;

begin
SetupSRl;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(false)
end.
